title: technology companies
extract: A technology company (often tech company) is a type of business entity that focuses primarily on the development and manufacturing of technology, or providing technology as a service. ... Information technology (IT) companies and high tech companies are subsets of technology companies.
extract_html: A technology company (often tech company) is a type of business entity that focuses primarily on the development and manufacturing of technology, or providing technology as a service. ... Information technology (IT) companies and high tech companies are subsets of technology companies.
